    Upcoming: PhD Course @ AAU Copenhagen

    less than 1 minute read

    We’re happy to announce that we’ll be running a PhD Course on Musically Embodied Machine Learning at AAU Copenhagen, in collaboration with Dan Overholt. The course will take place from 15th-17th January 2025. We’ll be announcing more information soon, but please get in contact if you’re interested in attending.

    Tags: phd

    Categories: course, event

    Updated: September 25, 2024
